about_the_game:
Deck-Building Card Battle!
An Rrealtime-style card game that you can easily play with a deck of 10 cards and simple rules.

Card battles that progress in real time!
Build a deck of your choice and fight through the battle!

With over 100 different cards, use a variety of skills to hunt down your enemies!
In a world where humans are turned into cards, can you survive and take revenge?

Play image

The game has two parts: the story part and the battle part.
While following the story and pursuing the truth of the cards, you will use the cards to defeat the pursuers and other enemies sent by the empire.

About Combat




Ancient Sacrifice is a deck-building card game that progresses in real time. Combat progresses in real time, so there is no time to think carefully as in most card games.

Do you put together only strong cards and push through with power?
Or do you play strong cards at the expense of easy cards?

It is up to you to decide what strategy to use when building your deck.




Over 40 skills!
Over 100 cards!

Find your own optimal solution from a wide range of card options.

Take advantage of the battle by paying attention to the speed and amount of mana recovery, which varies depending on the map.

My Card

[My Card] is unlocked in the mid-game.
Allows you to create a card to your liking by acquiring skills.
Create a card that suits your deck with your own hands!

Worldview

A world where cards have power.
The empire sacrifices lives to generate cards, and by harnessing the power of the cards, it hopes to maintain peace.



The story begins when Amelia Malerin, whose father is a card smith, is entrusted by her father with a card that has been passed down in the family.

Musics an Arts

Arts: Midjourney

Musics: Peritune / 効果音ラボ

Video Streaming Guidelines

Individuals and corporations can stream without prior permission.
